livecoding.tv.channel: << your lctv username (or whatever channel you want the bot to join), eg. longsteve >>
livecoding.tv.nickname: << your full bot username, eg. my_chat_bot@livecoding.tv >>
livecoding.tv.chatname: << An arbitrary name your chat bot calls itself by, eg. Tim >>
livecoding.tv.owner: << An arbitrary name the bot uses to refer to you, eg. Steve >>
livecoding.tv.followers-feed-url: << Your follower feed url, obtained from the lctv Follows page >>
livecoding.tv.cloc-command: cloc --exclude-dir=node_modules,frameworks --exclude-lang=CMake --progress-rate=0 --csv --quiet << Your absolute project file path >>
